revised_title: Improving Forests and Forestry in Britain: Site Amelioration, Breeding, and Protection
tldr: This article discusses ways to improve forest yield and timber quality in Britain through site amelioration, tree breeding, and protection from environmental factors. The author highlights the importance of understanding wood characteristics and tree genetics to enhance forest growth and meet the needs of timber industries. The article also emphasizes the need for further research to fully realize the potential of various species and sites.
